DESCRIPTION.P: This special block is only use to add text at any point of the diagram window. It has no effect on the simulation.

ITEM.label: txt
ITEM.SP: : a character string, Text to be displayed

ITEM.label: font
ITEM.SP: : a positive integer less than 6, number of selected font (see xset)

ITEM.label: siz
ITEM.SP: : a positive integer, selected font size (see xset)
